content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified">  <xsd:element name="Order">   <xsd:complexType>    <xsd:sequence>     <xsd:element name="Items">      <xsd:complexType>       <xsd:sequence>        <xsd:element name="Item" maxOccurs="unbounded">         <xsd:complexType>          <xsd:attribute name="itemNumber" type="xsd:integer" use="required"/>          <xsd:attribute name="itemQty" type="xsd:integer" use="required"/>         </xsd:complexType>        </xsd:element>       </xsd:sequence>      </xsd:complexType>     </xsd:element>    </xsd:sequence>    <xsd:attribute name="accountNumber" type="xsd:integer" use="required"/>    <xsd:attribute name="totalAmount" type="xsd:float" use="required"/>    <xsd:attribute name="emailAddress" type="xsd:string" use="required"/>    <xsd:attribute name="orderType" use="required">     <xsd:simpleType>      <xsd:restriction base="xsd:NMTOKEN">       <xsd:enumeration value="PO"/>       <xsd:enumeration value="Credit"/>      </xsd:restriction>     </xsd:simpleType>    </xsd:attribute>    <xsd:attribute name="cardType" use="required">     <xsd:simpleType>      <xsd:restriction base="xsd:NMTOKEN">       <xsd:enumeration value="MC-VISA"/>       <xsd:enumeration value="Discover"/>       <xsd:enumeration value="AMEX"/>      </xsd:restriction>     </xsd:simpleType>    </xsd:attribute>   </xsd:complexType>  </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>
